item.title: CVE-2023-1671|2023-04-26T00:00:00 -- sophos -- sophos%20web%20appliance
item.description: A pre-auth command injection vulnerability in the warn-proceed handler of Sophos Web Appliance older than version 4.3.10.4 allows execution of arbitrary code.
